title: Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining both frontend and backend applications to ensure software quality and performance.
responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain backend applications
Perform testing to ensure software quality
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in IT or Computer related field
Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience in C#, PHP, Java, or other popular programming languages
Experience with database systems like MS-SQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, or MongoDB
Experience with MVC architecture and Web API development
Familiarity with Git version control system
Ability to work in a team, meet deadlines, and work with minimal supervision
companyDescription: Tech Company is a leading provider of innovative software solutions. We foster a collaborative and supportive culture to drive success and creativity.

title: System Analyst
description: We are looking for a System Analyst to join our team. You will be responsible for creating software design documentation, gathering user requirements, and proposing IT solutions to improve business operations.
responsibilities: Create Software Design and Analysis documentation such as Software Requirements Specification, Software Design Document, etc.
Create Business Process Modeling and propose improvements to support business operations through IT technology
Work collaboratively in teams, meet deadlines, and work with minimal supervision
Create reports for management and stakeholders regularly
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems or a Computer-related field
Strong communication skills, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail
Minimum 2 years of experience in a similar role
Solid understanding of the System Development Life Cycle using Unified Process or Agile methodologies
companyDescription: Tech Company is a leading provider of innovative software solutions. We foster a collaborative and creative culture to drive excellence in every project.
